ContextProject.Comment: A35 Master without Cortex M33 TrustZone activated ?
ContextProject.Name: A35TD_TZDIS

ContextProject.Comment: A35 Master with Cortex M33 TrustZone activated ?
ContextProject.Name: A35TD_TZEN

Context.Comment:
Enable the Boot ROM context for the peripheral(s) that you want to use as boot device(s):
this will restrain the pins choices to the ones recognized by the Boot ROM.
Context.Name: BootROMA35

Context.Comment:
Enable the Boot loader context (TF-A_BL2) for the peripheral(s)
that you want to use in the early boot execution context
Context.Name: CortexA35SFSBLA

Context.Comment:
Enable the Cortex-A35 context for the peripheral(s)
that you plan to use from Secure OS
Context.Name: CortexA35SSecureOS

Context.Comment:
Enable the Cortex-A35 non-secure context for the peripheral(s)
that you want to use from U-Boot
Context.Name: CortexA35NSSSBL

Context.Comment:
Enable the Cortex-A35 non-secure context for the peripheral(s)
that you plan to use from Linux
Context.Name: CortexA35NSOS

Context.Comment:
Enable the Boot loader context for the peripheral(s)
that you want to use in the early boot execution context
Context.Name: CortexM33SFSBLM

Context.Comment:
Enable the Cortex-M33 context for the peripheral(s)
that you plan to use from Secure OS
Context.Name: CortexM33SSecureOS

Context.Comment:
Enable the Cortex-M33 non-secure context for the peripheral(s)
that you want to use from Cube
Context.Name: CortexM33NS

Context.Comment:
Enable the External Memory Loader code context only for the peripheral(s)
you want to use in Eloader
Context.Name: ExtMemLoader
